value.title: Google Tunix Hack - Train a model to show its work
value.description: Teach a LLM to reason using Tunix, Google's new JAX-native library for LLM post-training.
value.recommendation: Best for demonstrating cutting-edge ML skills with LLMs and reinforcement learning using Google's new Tunix library.

value.leaderboard_analysis: Unable to retrieve leaderboard data due to API errors
value.research_findings: No specific academic papers found through API, but general strategies developed based on competition requirements
recommended_approaches: Focus on understanding and using Google's Tunix library
Use reinforcement learning techniques for reasoning
Address ML ethics in text generation
Develop robust evaluation and debugging tools
next_steps: Set up development environment with JAX and Tunix
Create baseline model with pre-trained LLM
